title: #677 - Tom Papa
description:
Tom Papa, a stand up comedian seen on Netflix, Comedy Central and the host of the "Come to Papa" podcast, joins Joey Diaz and Lee Syatt LIVE in studio.

This podcast is brought to you by: 

Manscaped - Get 20% off your first order and a travel bag if you purchase “The Perfect Package” at manscaped.com and use the code CHURCH 

CBD Lion - For all of your CBD needs, from shatter to gummies go to CBDLion.com and use code CHURCH for 20% off. 

Onnit.com. Use Promo code CHURCH for a 10% discount at checkout.
